summary: REQ-1 appears to be implemented in NoButton.tsx via viewport-aware bounds calculation (including visualViewport offsets), padding, and clamping/random positioning using the buttonâ€™s measured rendered size. However, two modified non-feature files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) introduce/record unrelated changes not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced extensive descriptions of new UI/styling/animation features across many frontend files (e.g., new animations, fireworks changes, music control, gradients), which were not requested and violate the constraint to avoid changing behavior/styling outside the 'No' button positioning fix.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states non-goals: no new screens/messages/animations and no behavior/styling changes outside the viewport-safe positioning fix. The diff includes a modified summary file asserting many unrelated feature changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/state to add/track a new feature request entry (AR-1) and other project state fields, which were not requested as part of the frontend fix.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for the frontend 'No' button viewport-safe positioning fix; updating project tracking metadata is not a requested deliverable.
